Benko also said that  Mike Pence 's open commitment to socially conservative values would resonate with tea party members:  He has demonstrable integrity both in his word and his deed- that is really extraordinary,  Benko said. "I think people are looking for integrity, and  Mike Pence 's integrity is so vivid that once you focus on it, I think that's going to move a lot of people.""
